betterquesting.name: The End Asteroid Belt
betterquesting.desc:
It orbits the Mystical Gas Giant, so it requires the Mystical World Orb

Large deposit of draconium, Chaos shards. Beware, Chaos Guardian Included.

betterquesting.name: Crops
betterquesting.desc:
Food. The fist part of your journy will be a lot about food. And let me tell you that the time of backpack full of baked potatoes is over.

Well. The food you can pick here is not omnipotent an you wil quickley get sick of eating just one kind. So: make a big variety... I mean it. BIG. The bigger the better chance to survive.

betterquesting.name: HomeWorld Gas Giant
betterquesting.desc:
It requires the Home World Orb

Well it is a Gas Giant so you don't mine any minerals here, but it is a good source of Oxygen, Hydrogen, Nitrogen, Cloud Seed, Nutrient Destilation and Hootch.

betterquesting.name: SandMoon Moon
betterquesting.desc:
It orbits the Mystical Gas Giant, so it requiresthe Mystical World Orb

Small deposits of Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Nickel, Ovium and Basalt.

Large deposites of Iron, Gold, Redstone, Diamonds, Osram, Silver and Coal.

Also Meteorite, Black Quartz, Tiberium, Cobalt, Ardite, Nether Quartz, Soul Sand, Uranium, Glowstone, Titanium and Prometheum can be found here.

betterquesting.name: AlienWorld Planet
betterquesting.desc:
Almost pleasant world.

Needs Alien World Orb

Small deposits of Iron, Gold, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Lead, Eezo, Osram and Silver

Large deposits of Redstone, Lapis, Diamonds, Emeralds, Aluminium, Zinc, Nickel, Basalt, Karmesine and Duranite.

Some Coal, Ovium and Draconium. Meteorite, Apatite, Iridium and Osram.

betterquesting.name: Messa Island
betterquesting.desc:
NETHERRACK !!
Nether quartz [10-150]
Gold [5-35]
Lapis [5-25]
Silver [20-55]
 Prometheum [2-45]

betterquesting.name: Star System B
betterquesting.desc: The gate into star system B is the DistantWorld planet. You can get there through its WorldOrb, or you can build a portal from the Nether. The portal is standard 2*3, made from chiseled Blocks of Uranium. Ignited by the Golden Scythe again. Description of individual Star System B worlds are here for you to read.

betterquesting.name: LavaWorld Planet
betterquesting.desc:
Closest planet to the Sun, Wery Hot and Hostile.

Needs Lava World Orb

Small deposits of Redstone, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Nickel, Eezo and Dilithium

Large deposits of Iron, Gold, Lead, Eezo, Basalt, Silver and Carmesine

 Also Meteorite, Apatite, Titanium and Osram

Neherrack, Tiberium, Cobalt, Ardite and Nether Quartz

betterquesting.name: Initial Warnings
betterquesting.desc:
SOME WARNINGS for a new contestant:

1) STAY OUT OF WATER !! AQUA-CREEPERS are BAD !!
2) Build a Bed/Sleeping bag, this is ZOMBIE territory
3) Sleep through nights
4) Focus on food variety

betterquesting.name: Planets and The Goal
betterquesting.desc:
To complete this modpack (if you need a final task for a sandbox game) you must build your spaceship and reach the orbit of the Mooshroom Moon. And do what ever there, because I didn't ye thought about the final goal. Build me a monument using a lot of Adamant.

Now Mooshroom Moon is orbitting the Blue Giant in the next Star System. And you will have to explore a lot to get there.

betterquesting.name: Under End
betterquesting.desc:
Maybe you noticed that to get into space, you are missing some End-Ores. Well theEnd is a moon orbitting 4th planet of Star A so no, you cannot go there yet. But you can go to UnderEnd. That is an End-like dimension deep under the surface of your world. To get there, you must:

1)Unlock the portal by crafting the Boring Diamondhead for the Railcraft BoringMachine
2)Build the portal (standart 2*3) using Smooth Endstone. Hint: You can get endstone in deeper layers of the Roguelike Dungeon.
3)Light the portal using the Golden Scythe.

betterquesting.name: Mining Asteroids
betterquesting.desc:
Another way how to get some resources is to lounch asteroid mining mission. Followig ores can be getered.

Iron, Gld, Redstone, Lapis, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Silver, Nickel, Eezo, Osram, Basalt, Dilithium and Meteorite.

betterquesting.name: Asteroid Belt
betterquesting.desc:
Belt is the second Moon of your HomeWorld Giant. But before you go there here is small warning. It is an Asteroid Belt. It can easily happen, that your rocket will not hit any land and just disappear into the space. But sooner or later, you will have to go there anyway. So Good Luck.

And Deposites: Iron, Gold, Redstone, Lapis, Diamond, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Basalt, Titanium, Silver.

 Also Cobalt, Ardite and Nether Quartz.

betterquesting.name: Moon
betterquesting.desc:
Moon is your closest and easiest target.

Deposites of Iron, Gold, Redstone, Lapis, Emeralds, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Nickel, Osram, Basalt and Silver.

Also Meteorite and Karmesine.

betterquesting.name: CrystalMoon Moon
betterquesting.desc:
This moon is orbiting the AlienWorld Planet, so it has the same World Orb.

Natural Growth of Crystal Block Spires.

Small deposites of Iron, Gold, Redstone, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Lead, Eezo, Ovium and Glowstone.

Large deposites of Lapis, Diamonds, Emeralds, Lead, Nickel, Osram, Meteorite and Karmesine.

betterquesting.name: MushroomWorld Moon
betterquesting.desc:
It orbits the BlueBall Gas Giant. But it is so important that the World Orb is named by this world, not the Planet. Mushroom World Orb.

Deposits of Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Redstone, Lapis, Nickel, Eezo, Osram, Basalt, Black Quartz, Jauxum, Uru and Aurorium can be found here.

betterquesting.name: DistantWorld Planet
betterquesting.desc:
It requires the Distant World Orb or Gateway through the Nether

Small deposites of Iron, Redstone, Lapis, Zinc, Nickel and Basalt.

Large deposits of Gold, Diamonds, Emeralds, Lead, Eezo, Osram, Silver, SoulSand an Uranium.

Also Coal, Dilithium, Jauxum, Magma, Netherrak and Valyrium.

betterquesting.name: OceanWorld Planet
betterquesting.desc:
It requires the Ocean World Orb

Small Deposites of Gold, Diamonds, Emeralds, Zinc, Lead, Nickel, Eezo and Silver.

Large deposites of Iron, Redstone, Lapis, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Osram, Basalt and Duranite.

Also Coal Ovium, Vibranium, Iridium and Titanium.

betterquesting.name: RocksInSky Asteroid Belt
betterquesting.desc:
It orbits the OceanWorld, so it requires the Ocean World Orb

It is an Asteroid Belt, so beware of the landing hazard.

 Deposits of ron, Gold, Redstone, Lapis, Emeralds, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Nickel, Titanium, Silver, Cobalt, Ardite, Nether Quartz and Prometheum.

betterquesting.name: Star System A
betterquesting.desc: Now you have a Warp Ship which can go nowhere. Well. For your ship to be able to warp, you must put correct WorldOrb into the Warp Controller. I will give you here the list of Planets with their resources and required Orbs. Figure it out yourself. Small hint. Your final goal in StarSystem A is to get to the Blue Giant MysticalWorld.

betterquesting.name: Charcoal
betterquesting.desc: This is a good alternative to Coal. Also needed for Smeltery later on. To get Charcoal, you will have to use the Forestry way. Make a pyramid out of 20 Loam with 2x2 of WoodPiles inside and ignite it.

betterquesting.name: Armor Up
betterquesting.desc: Sooner or later you will need to do some fighting. Start getting ready for it by hardening some leather.

betterquesting.name: Smeltery
betterquesting.desc: Time to put that Charcoal into good use. Build a smeltery, it can not doule your ores, but it will give you more than a plain furnace. Well... with basin for now only.

betterquesting.name: Storage Crates
betterquesting.desc: You need to pile up your things even more. Especially now when you are getting harvests. Storage Crates are a good solution for you.

betterquesting.name: Drawers
betterquesting.desc: What about some alternative to the oh so boring chests? Maybe Storage Drawers?

betterquesting.name: Heaven and Hell
betterquesting.desc: If you reached SandMoon, which is orbitting MysticalWorld Blue Giant, you can go on and finally visit Nether and theEnd. Portal to the nether is unlocked by crafting Uranium Seed. Shape and igniter are unchanged, Obsidian 2*3, FlintandSteel. The End has no portal. Just point there your rocket and pray.

betterquesting.name: Bees and Traps
betterquesting.desc: Next goal is wax and leather. So yes... bees from the begginning. Are you excited? The land and water traps can also supply the so much missing meat for your diet.

betterquesting.name: Tinkers Tools
betterquesting.desc: So you probably survived the first night. By punching wood and leaves. But that is enough. Now it is time to make some tools.

betterquesting.name: Wool and Rope
betterquesting.desc: Now lets start a technological revolution. Shell we? Well... slowly at first. You will definitely need some ropes, cotton, cloth and wool.

betterquesting.name: Clay and Bucket
betterquesting.desc: Not enough clay? Try to use the receipt with Water Bowl, Dirt and Leaves. And when we are talking about Water Bown, do you know that you can make a simple Bucket out of Clay?

betterquesting.name: No quests mandatory
betterquesting.desc: Some people just don't like quests. Fair enough, I want this to be pure joy (or suffering what ever you preffer) even for you. That is why the most important information is pulled out of the common questline and put here. So you can read it and play even without the other quests.

betterquesting.name: Furnace
betterquesting.desc: How to tame the flames? Yes you can. Just don't think that you don't have to sleep any more. A pro po, the necesary mud bricks can be made also by drying dirt.

betterquesting.name: Your Home
betterquesting.desc:
Your home is a moon orbitting the HomeWorld gas giant, 3rd planet of the star A. I call this moon Home. Speciality of the Home is that it is an Ocean moon with a lot of islands. Another speciality is that it's mineral deposits are spreaded based on the biome, which dominates each island.

 Meaning find a tropical island and it will have different ores underneath than a desert island. For your ease, I will give you here list of know island types and their ores so you don't have to just guess. A pro po, Boats are disabled and Ocean is full of aqua-creepers. Build yourself a Ship or AirShip.

betterquesting.name: Flint
betterquesting.desc: For now, you have only the old fashion way to get flint. Break a block of Gravel and you have a chance.

betterquesting.name: Casting Table
betterquesting.desc: Before you start doing anything industry-like you will have to upgrade your smeltery with casting basin. Did you noticed that you need duranite for that? Look for it near the bedrock.

betterquesting.name: Automation
betterquesting.desc: With the access to basic metals, you may want to start making your first factory. Do you know that you can build a timer for example with a conveyor belt?

betterquesting.name: Frames
betterquesting.desc: Tired of manual crafting? There is also autocrafting for poor you know? They are called Supercrafting frames and they are cheap.

betterquesting.name: Leaving your Home
betterquesting.desc: So you can go into space... what now? Well Now you need to teach your ship to WARP. For that you will need to visit the other moons of your HomeWorld Gas Giant and start Asteroid Mining missions. I will make it easier for you by giving here some hints for each of those.

betterquesting.name: First Tanks
betterquesting.desc: Liquids must be stored somewhere. Well, you are far enough to be able to do just that. Water Barrels and Seared Tanks are your solution for now.

betterquesting.name: Treated Wood
betterquesting.desc: Charcoal can be fired up in Coke Oven into Coal Coke. Byproduct is the Oil. Basic resource for all the engineering.

betterquesting.name: Taiga Island
betterquesting.desc:
Osram [0-10]
Zinc [30-40]
 Aluminium [40-120]
 Gold [5-35]
 Diamond [5-25]

betterquesting.name: Hills Island
betterquesting.desc:
Iron [10-55]
Diamond [5-25]
Emerald[40-130]
Lapis [5-25]

betterquesting.name: Don't try Nether/End
betterquesting.desc: Nether and End works differently then you are used to. So just please don't try to go there without my guidence. The attempt to open a portal will probably be fatal.

betterquesting.name: Light
betterquesting.desc: If you want to start venturing into the deep you will need light. That means torches. For that you will need Wax, Ropes, Wood and a little bit Coal or CharCoal.

betterquesting.name: Ores which are everywhere
betterquesting.desc:
Coal [0 - 128]
Redstone [0-16]
Copper [30-120]
Iron[0-30]
Duranite[0-10]
Basalt[0-50]

Poor Iron[0-64]
Poor Gold[0-32]
Poor Copper[40-255]
Poor Tin[40-255]
Poor Lead[20-50]
Poor Silver[10-42]
Poor Nickel[30-60]
Poor Zink[20-60]

betterquesting.name: Forrest Islands
betterquesting.desc:
Aluminium [40-120]
Tin [30-100]
Copper [30-120]

betterquesting.name: Desert Islands
betterquesting.desc:
Saltpeter [50-80]
 Redstone [0-16]
 Emerald [40-130]
Diamond [5-25]

betterquesting.name: Iceberg Island
betterquesting.desc:
Gold [5-35]
Lead [15-40]
Osram [0-10]
 Silver [20-55]

betterquesting.name: Savanna Islands
betterquesting.desc:
Iron [10-55]
 Nickel [30-50]
 Eezo [15-40]
 Aluminium [40-120]

betterquesting.name: Roadmap
betterquesting.desc: Overall guide to this pack.

betterquesting.name: Pre-Industrial
betterquesting.desc: From first night to Smeltery. This is your first bunch of guides to follow.
